item.title: C1 : Ayurveda Nursing & Panchakarma Therapy
item.description: The Diploma course on Ayurveda Nursing & Panchakarma Therapy is a comprehensive program designed to provide students with a thorough understanding of Ayurvedic principles and practices, as well as the skills and knowledge needed to apply them in a nursing or healthcare setting.
